summary: the toddler 's mother was holding him and another child when he slipped and fell between 10 to 12ft and into the pit on saturday around 3pm . the child was rescued by his parents before firefighters and paramedics arrived on the scene . he suffered from minor bumps and bruises and was listed in stable condition at the hospital .

2. The boy was rescued by his parents before firefighters and paramedics arrived, suffering from minor bumps and bruises.
